reviews.review: Very fun and addicting. The core game play loop combined with the character leveling system keeps me coming back for more.

Got this game because it was on sale but it's worth way more than 8 bucks tbh. First off gameplay is excellent compared to other games out there, I've played this game for a long time [Console], I still find that it holds up compared to other modern games, and most importantly it's still fun for both survivor and killer. Please don't get this game just to play the killers, get the game with some friends and play survivor and killer equally if you want this game to stay fresh and fun. Umm licensed survivors/killers cost money sadly but it's worth it just to have your favorite killer to play as, and the original killers are good as well. 9/10 because no more steve hair
Jesus christ I hate this game, highly recommend.

This is a fun horror game with a good variety of characters.  However, this is really only enjoyable with friends.  Otherwise, you get teamed and stuck with the people who leave you to die, bait you, and don't help.  If you have friends, I highly recommend.  If you don't have friends, you might want to reconsider :/
逃生不是解脱，钩子才是归宿----真就一挂梅
If you have friends survivor is the way to go but if you don't just play as killer. Oh and not enabling cross-play makes the lag reallll.

İlk oynadığım zamanlarda ölsem bile zevk alırdım hala aynı tadı alıyorum. Uzun zamandır oynamıyordum tekrardan yükledim. Tek de girseniz arkadaşlarınızla da girseniz her türlü zevk alıyorsunuz. Zamanında camp atan Leatherfaceler vardı hala var mı bilmiyorum :D. Bu arada Stranger Things izledikten sonra bir hawkins laboratuvarında oynayalım dedik DLC 'sini silmişsiniz anısı vardı üzüldüm :(

Love-Hate relationship forms from high replay value versus exploitable/broken game mechanics that are slowly getting fixed over time.

サバイバーとキラーに分かれて戦うゲームですがどちらも面白いです。ただしキラーの難易度はかなり高いです。ゲーム性がとてもシンプルでわかりやすいのと操作が簡単で慣れるのも早いと思います。民度がどうこうはゲームの問題ではなくプレイヤー側の問題なので個人的にこのゲームの評価にはならないと思っています。

そのうえでこのゲームの低評価レビューするに至った経緯なのですが、オーリックセルというゲーム内でスキンやDLCキャラクターなどと交換できるゲーム内通貨を購入したのですが反映されないという致命的な問題が起きたからです。支払いだけが完了して金だけとられてオーリックセルが反映されないという絶望的な状況です。

［追記］
もう一度購入を試みたところ次は反映されました。一回目の反映されてない分に関しては金とられたままです。問い合わせも日本語でしてみましたが運営元が日本語対応しているかもわからないので泣き寝入りになる気がしています。高い勉強代を払うことになりましたのでこのゲームに課金はもうしません。

[追記２]
相変わらず最初に購入したオーリックセルは反映されていませんが、サポートの方とのやり取りの後にチームへ報告していただき進展があれば連絡をくれるそうです。

First played this game on PS4 before moving to PC. I've been playing this game since 2017 on and off I think it is a extremely fun game. Yeah it has its issues but it has come a very long way over the years. I would recommend not taking the game too seriously just relax and have some fun you win some and you lose some. The game can be very stressful if you take it too seriously and expect to win every game. Right now Behaviour is in the process of doing the biggest update in he history of the game reworking perks and game play so hopefully that turns out to be a good change. But all in all would recommend.

picked the game back up after being away for a bit.  3 hrs into my session im reminded why i quit playing this game.  as it stand now no i dont recommend the game.  its not balanced at all.....unless u play survivor then by all means go for it....almost always a guaranteed W.  The survivors have so many second chance perks that its not about skills.  the perks carry for u.  ill try it again after upcoming patch and hopefully the games more balanced.
Even though this game can be repetitive at times, it’ll always be my favorite, this game has gotten me through hard times in my life and it’s even more fun to play with friends.
It's such a fun horror experience!
